title: AVX2 implementation for tanh
body_html:
This PR addresses #4984. Adding AVX2 implementation for tanh function

Before 7a28292

In [12]: x = torch.randn(10000, 10000)

In [13]: %time _ = torch.tanh(x)
CPU times: user 796 ms, sys: 126 ms, total: 923 ms
Wall time: 925 ms

In [15]: x = torch.randn(1000, 1000)

In [16]: %time _ = torch.tanh(x)
CPU times: user 7.27 ms, sys: 916 µs, total: 8.19 ms
Wall time: 7.17 ms

After df69faf

In [36]: x = torch.randn(10000, 10000)

In [37]: %time _ = torch.tanh(x)
CPU times: user 282 ms, sys: 153 ms, total: 434 ms
Wall time: 436 ms

In [51]: x = torch.randn(1000, 1000)

In [52]: %time _ = torch.tanh(x)
CPU times: user 2.11 ms, sys: 649 µs, total: 2.76 ms
Wall time: 1.95 ms

@zdevito @ezyang Please review

Edit :: Modify perf numbers after moving to cmath tanh implementation.

body:
This PR addresses #4984. Adding AVX2 implementation for `tanh` function

**Before 7a28292**
```
In [12]: x = torch.randn(10000, 10000)

In [13]: %time _ = torch.tanh(x)
CPU times: user 796 ms, sys: 126 ms, total: 923 ms
Wall time: 925 ms

In [15]: x = torch.randn(1000, 1000)

In [16]: %time _ = torch.tanh(x)
CPU times: user 7.27 ms, sys: 916 µs, total: 8.19 ms
Wall time: 7.17 ms
```



**After df69faf**
```
In [36]: x = torch.randn(10000, 10000)

In [37]: %time _ = torch.tanh(x)
CPU times: user 282 ms, sys: 153 ms, total: 434 ms
Wall time: 436 ms

In [51]: x = torch.randn(1000, 1000)

In [52]: %time _ = torch.tanh(x)
CPU times: user 2.11 ms, sys: 649 µs, total: 2.76 ms
Wall time: 1.95 ms

```

@zdevito @ezyang Please review 


------
Edit :: Modify perf numbers after moving to cmath `tanh` implementation.
